WorkItem.Description:
To reproduce:
Start a new character and click any item slot (rawr will calculate how much each item gives you when totally naked and display a nice list)
Open a saved character and click the same item slot (rawr will display the same list, which was valid for a naked character and not at all the character you are using)
Â 
I'm attaching an image so it's easier to see the problem.
WorkItem.Summary: Rawr stores its calculations in cache too long

Comments.Message: Good catch. It hinges on using the same slot dropdown... I'll get that fixed.
